Description:
Great Home Close To Town
Situated on Lowndes Street, only minutes from the heart of Bendigo, Strath Village shopping centre and Kennington primary school is this great 3 bedroom weather board home. Quality renovated kitchen incl. gas hot plates, electric wall oven, dishwasher and great cupboard space. All Bedrooms with BIR's, upgraded bathroom, ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout. There is a double garage at the rear, a new wooden deck under the pergola and a good size backyard. Don't miss your chance to own this beautiful property in a fantastic location.
Lee Savage : 0417 076 495

Description:
APARTMENT SPACE READY FOR YOUR PERSONAL TOUCH
Imagine sitting back on your private balcony overlooking St Aidans Park.
Create your own design to suit you and your lifestyle. Situated on the ground level of the St Aidans Building is a 13 square (approx.) apartment shell fully serviced waiting fit-out. Also included are a secure storage room and two allocated car spaces. Plans are available for a two bedroom, 2 bathroom fit-out or design your own plans - options are endless.
The historic St Aidans Park is a secure gated complex with spacious landscaped grounds, swimming pool, undercover parking, common room and workshop. This is a once in a lifetime opportunity to purchase a part of Bendigo's history.
Apartment 16, 190 St Aidans Road, Kennington
Sandi Dixon : 0418337275

Description:
Contemporary Elegance with an Abundance of Space
Quality exceeds itself in this large family home. North facing and light filled,this superb home is located in a brilliant position within an easy walk to schools, supermarkets,Strath Village and Strath Hill Shopping Centres. Only a few minutes drive to the CBD. Featuring 3 zoned living areas, 4 spacious bedrooms all with WIR's and stunning ensuite ( with corner spa and separate powder room) . Well appointed kitchen complete with electric oven with 5 burner gas hot plates and walk in pantry. The central family bathroom is also complimented by a spa and separate powder room. Ducted and zoned refrigerated heating/cooling, ducted vacuum, large laundry,Internet networking and wired for sound. Dual garages both with remote and internal access as well as rear roller door and extra storage space to one. Step outside to enjoy the large undercover entertainment area and fully landscaped gardens with auto.watering system. There is also garden shed with concrete floor. This is a complete family package in a very sought after area.
Jenny Donaldson : 0409 484 391

Description:
A Rare Find - Kennington
Located in a quiet residential street adjoining a reserve and within easy walking distance of all Strathdale facilities is this modern Macquarie built home.
With great street appeal and a versatile floorplan this home would suit retirees, professionals or a family.
Accommodation comprises lovely entrance foyer, Lounge/theatre room, well appointed galley' style kitchen and adjoining Family/Meals room with feature gas log fire, Master Bedroom with dual W.I.Robes & Ensuite, 2 other spacious Bedrooms, Study or multi purpose room, 3 piece family Bathroom and a great laundry. The home features high ceilings, ducted heating and cooling and quality fittings and furnishings throughout.
Outside a great entertaining area with vergola, double garage and workshop, garden shed and low maintenance garden surrounds.
This property is the complete package - a modern home in a prime residential location only minutes to the city centre.
Insights: 15A Timbertop Drive, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2012 and 74 other 3 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious & Secure Lakeside Lifestyle
Few properties enjoy such a privileged position alongside picturesque Kennington Reservoir and only two minutes walk to Strathdale's best facilities.
Life beside the lake will be a breeze in this immaculate townhouse featuring formal lounge and spacious open-plan kitchen, meals and sitting area with big bay windows overlooking the water. The crisp, all-white kitchen is complete with electric cooking, dishwasher and ample cabinetry.
Every room is generously proportioned including two bedrooms, both with robes, main with ensuite and the main bathroom.
Ducted heating and cooling, quality floor tiling and drapes and plenty of natural light throughout add the perfect finishing touches.
Outside is a delightful courtyard-style garden securely fenced for pets and privacy. Paved areas between raised garden beds full of spring colours provide sunny sitting areas along with a pretty front garden and porch.
Security is a big feature, this is the rear unit of only two on the block and the single garage with remote roller door under the roofline has access to the rear yard.
Retire in style and make the most of the prime position with Strath Village and all its benefits just a short stroll away.
Insights: 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
SOLID BRICK VENEER HOME WITH ROOM TO GROW
This home is set in a quiet street on a 720m2 (approx) block with plenty of room to grow. It is situated close to the University and features a very solid double lock up garage with street access through the double carport and the secure fencing.
This home has 3 bedrooms 2 with ceiling fans, all with BIR'S plus a study. It offers a kitchen with gas hot plates, wall mounted oven, a good sized pantry and the perfect solution to stop those morning bathroom arguments by having a separate shower room. This home has gas heating in the lounge and evaporative cooling throughout.

Description:
SOLID BRICK VENEER HOME WITH ROOM TO GROW
This home is set in a quiet street on a 720m2 (approx) block with plenty of room to grow. It is situated close to the University and features a very solid double lock up garage with street access through the double carport and the secure fencing.
This home has 3 bedrooms 2 with ceiling fans, all with BIR'S plus a study. It offers a kitchen with gas hot plates, wall mounted oven, a good sized pantry and the perfect solution to stop those morning bathroom arguments by having a separate shower room. This home has gas heating in the lounge and evaporative cooling throughout.

Description:
Just Wait Till You Step Inside This One
Bathed in glorious northern sunlight, this immaculately presented residence offers sought- after space and privacy. The North facing open plan dining and living areas have large picture windows that capture the beauty of the enchanting cottage-style gardens and natural reserve views. There are two large bedrooms with an abundance of storage space and one has direct access to the two-way bathroom. The timber kitchen also has garden views. Comfortable living is provided for by gas ducted heating, an open fire place, electrical cooling in the living areas, a ducted vacuum system and a garage with remote-controlled access. This architect-designed house is located in one of Bendigo's most sought-after areas, just off Mill Street.
Phone for inspection today.
Jenny Donaldson : 0409 484 391

Description:
INVEST OR OCCUPY – YOU CHOOSE! DRESS CIRCLE LOCATION
Located in the ever popular McIvor Hill Precinct, this lovely townhouse with bull nose verandahs is situated within walking distance to supermarket, shops, entertainment and presents an excellent opportunity for the investor or owner occupier alike. Entry is to a very spacious lounge / dining area with electric heating and cooling unit, through to a compact kitchen with near new gas upright oven and dishwasher. The home comprises two large bedrooms with BIRs, four piece bathroom including separate toilet and laundry with built in cupboard. The rear yard offers a lovely spot to enjoy cuppa and book. With a large single carport with gate and garden shed it’s all here, so inspect today!

Description:
Art deco on family sized block
Situated within a short distance to the Bendigo CBD is this charming three bedroom home with polished floorboards throughout. Features include large bedrooms with built-in-robes, kitchen with stainless steel oven and gas cooktop, ample storage and a great sized backyard with paved barbeque area and lock-up shed. The prime position is close to La Trobe University, Strath Village, schools and public transport while still being within close proximity to town. The long driveway for off street parking and enclosed yard top this property off and make this the perfect investment property or ideal renovator. Rent out while you prepare for the future or move in straight away!

Description:
More Than Meets The Eye
Don't be deceived, this well-presented home is much more than the modest brick veneer it appears from the outside, it has been cleverly extended and renovated to provide a multi-roomed home with a multitude of possible uses.
Inside there are five bedrooms (four with robes) plus a study, three bathrooms and two big living areas.
Add to this a family-sized kitchen with all mod cons, and a dining area to match. With ducted heating/cooling and storage at a premium throughout, there's ample room for a for a really large family where everyone can have a room to call their own.
Alternatively, it could be easily converted to provide a separate wing for live-in relatives or boarders. It would be ideal as student accommodation or a small backpackers hostel and is also suitable for professional rooms (STCA) with angle parking at the front door.
Externally it offers a covered outdoor living area, concrete paved driveway to a double carport and double garage set in easy-care gardens with secure fencing.
Located in the very heart of Kennington and directly opposite a small shopping strip including milk bar/takeaway, hairdresser, butcher, chemist and doctor's surgery. If that's not enough, there are both private and state primary schools within easy walking distance and a slightly longer walk will take you to the university, the city and supermarkets.
This is a rare chance to secure a unique property in a premium position for living in, letting out or launching a new business.
Insights: 5 other 5 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
Unit On Own Title In The Heart Of Kennington
Tucked away in a quiet blue-chip location and only a short stroll to Strath Village Shopping Centre, Kennington Reservoir and LaTrobe University is this spacious 2-bedroom unit on its own title, which means NO owners corp fees.
Features include lock-up garage, heating and cooling, spacious bedrooms with built in robes and a low-maintenance and private rear yard with room to grow a garden or for a small pet to play!
Near new bathroom has recently been fitted with some finishing touches required and a lick of paint through will realise its true potential.
A great buy for retirees, first home buyers and investors alike.
Owner must sell!
Insights: 1/2 Cardogen Place, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Kennington have recently been sold.
